remarks: Special case of ~ fvmpt for operator theorems.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.)
statement:
fvmptmap.1 $e |- C e. _V $.
fvmptmap.2 $e |- D e. _V $.
fvmptmap.3 $e |- R e. _V $.
fvmptmap.4 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvmptmap.5 $e |- F = ( x e. ( R ^m D ) |-> B ) $.
fvmptmap $p |- ( A : D --> R -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d R x $.
